title: Out-Of-This-World 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath in Evanston, Available: Now
posting_body: Terrific one bedroom, one bathroom in beautiful Evanston courtyard building features updated kitchen with dishwasher, spacious living area with decorative fireplace, separate dining room, large bedroom, great closet space, updated bathroom, laundry in building, hardwood floors throughout, and pets welcome!
Close to Dempster Purple Line el stop, Trader Joe's, and near downtown Evanston shops and restaurants!
to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention the Apartment ID above.
